text: We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Blaengarw #CF32 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 16:00. Andi.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Repton #DE65 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
Power is now back on in #Stroud #GL5 and surrounding areas.  We are sorry for any problems caused by the #powercut this morning.
We are aware that properties are without power in #Stroud #GL5 area. We aim to restore all supplies by 05:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut. Drew
Apologies for the #powercut in #Repton #DE65 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 04:00. Drew
Update #powercut #Truro #TR2 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 17:00. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #Birmingham #B37 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 16:30. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #Truro #TR2 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 14:00. Geraint
All customers affected by the #powercut in #GL17 #Lydbrook now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
We are sorry about the #powercut in #HopeValley #S33 and surrounding areas.  Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 13:30.
There is currently a #powercut in #GL17 #Lydbrook & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 13:00.  Siân
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to # Walsall #WS9 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Fiona
All supplies to #Liskeard #PL14 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut. Fiona
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Sidmouth #EX10 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused this evening. Fiona
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Walsall #WS9 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 20:30. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Liskeard #PL14 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 20:00. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Neath #SA10 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
Our apologies to customers affected by a #powercut in #Sidmouth #EX10. Engineers are en-route and estimate to restore all supplies by 19:00. David.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Walsall #WS9 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 17:30. Andi.
Our apologies to customers affected by a #powercut in #Liskeard #PL14. Engineers are working on it and estimate to restore all supplies by 17:30. David.
